game.name: Dwarf Legacy
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Captions available, Camera Comfort, Custom Volume Controls, Keyboard Only Option, Stereo Sound, Steam Cloud, Stats, Steam Leaderboards, Includes level editor, Family Sharing, Steam Timeline
game.shortDescription: 도전적인 정밀 플랫폼 게임. The Mountainhome의 수직 던전을 정복하며, 끊임없이 몰려오는 적 무리와 싸우고 위험한 함정을 극복하세요. 가장 높은 봉우리에 숨겨진 잃어버린 유산의 비밀을 밝혀내고 마을의 미래를 지키세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A challenging precision-platformer. Conquer vertical dungeons of The Mountainhome, battling relentless swarms of enemies and navigating perilous traps. Uncover the secret of your lost legacy hidden atop the highest peak and secure the future of your village.
